item.title: How to Install NGINX Unit on WSL 2 (Ubuntu)
item.description: I wanted to experiment with NGINX unit as it offers the ability to specify the runtime for the project, this will be particularly useful when some projects are PHP 7.4, some PHP 8.0 and others PHP 8.1. This guide explains how to install NGINX unit on Windows WSL 2
